testSteps.description: And ops manager should be able to bidding "new" order with truck_quantity = 3
And ops manager should be able to accept "new" bidding
And ops manager should be able to view amount of the selected bidding = 3
And ops manager should be able to assign driver to unassigned truck requests of "new" order
And ops manager should be able to send offers of "new" order to all drivers
And driver should be able to get new offer by "new" order
And hydra - driver should be able to accept "new" offer
And driver should be able to view all shipments info
And driver should be able to pick up all shipment
And driver should be able to drop off all shipment
Then ops manager should be able to verify "new" order completed
